amendment.description: To require a report on the effects of windmill farms on military readiness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2577 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2577 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12778-12791, S12792; text: CR S12791) To require a report on the effects of windmill farms on military readiness.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2577 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2577 proposed by Senator Warner.
